snippet: Litterbugs, beware: Nepal is making new rules to persuade trekkers to clean up after themselves on Mount Everest, in the hopes of clearing the tons of rubbish now clogging the world's highest peak....

headline.print_headline: Nepal Says Litterbugs No Longer Welcome on Everest
headline.main: Nepal Says Litterbugs No Longer Welcome on Everest

lead_paragraph: Litterbugs, beware: Nepal is making new rules to persuade trekkers to clean up after themselves on Mount Everest, in the hopes of clearing the tons of rubbish now clogging the world's highest peak.
